resources.string: *** CLICK HERE To ADD DETAILS *** \n A teacher is a person who helps people to learn. A teacher often works in a classroom. There are many different kinds of teachers. Some teachers teach young children in kindergarten or primary schools. Others teach older children in middle
One day is all it takes to change your results
‘Teaching is the highest form of understanding.’ –Aristotle
